name: Into the Woods (fielstoria)
description:
This is the first Visual Novel I've finished. Feburary 23,2021

This short Visual Novel is about a boy that struggles with depression, and how he comes to find hope. Even when everything seems dark we can keep pushing forward. There is always hope.
